  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick(String name, Point pos, Dimension size, Color border, Color inner, int strength)
      This Constructor checks properties of brick
      Parameters:
      name - string name of brick
      pos - position of point brick
      size - size of brick
      border - border color of brick
      inner - border color of inner brick
      strength - strength of brick

  • Method Details

    • makeBrickFace

      protected abstract Shape makeBrickFace(Point pos, Dimension size)
      This abstract generates brick
      Parameters:
      pos - position of where brick will generate
      size - size of the brick
      Returns:
      creates brick face

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact(Point2D point, int dir)
      This method checks for broken or not on impact
      Parameters:
      point - point at which crack will be set
      dir - direction towards point of where crack will be created
      Returns:
      if brick is not already broken returns broken
